subject: Medicine
title: Cloning: Copies of Life
description: One-minute skill: Cloning: Copies of Life.

hook.text: In 1996, a sheep named Dolly made headlines worldwide.

buildup.text: Scientists created her from the DNA of an adult sheep cell.

discovery.text: Dolly proved that adult cells could be reprogrammed.

twist.text: She aged faster than normal and developed early arthritis.

climax.text: Cloning animals is still rare and has many limitations.

punchline.text: A perfect copy still is not perfect.

quiz.question: What made Dolly the sheep scientifically remarkable?
options: She was cloned from an adult cell
She lived the longest of any sheep
She was the first test-tube animal
